# Commit Message Instructions

## Format

```
lab: <category> - <topic>
```

## Categories

| Folder      | Category |
| ----------- | -------- |
| javascript/ | js       |
| browser/    | browser  |
| css/        | css      |
| react/      | react    |
| utils/      | utils    |

## Rules

- Lowercase only
- No period at end
- Max 50 characters
- Use present tense verbs (add, fix, update)

## Examples

```
lab: js - closure memoization
lab: browser - intersection observer
lab: css - glassmorphism card
lab: utils - deep clone
lab: js - fix event loop quiz
```
